media_items.title: Example: Langworthy's Voting Record Under Scrutiny
media_items.author: Reporter Name
media_items.excerpt: An examination of Rep. Langworthy's voting record reveals patterns of voting against district interests on key issues including healthcare and agriculture.

media_items.title: Example: Op-Ed: Actions Speak Louder Than Words
media_items.author: Constituent Name
media_items.excerpt: Rep. Langworthy promises to support rural hospitals while voting against funding that would keep them open. NY-23 deserves better.

media_items.title: Example: Letter: Where is Our Representation?
media_items.author: Local Resident
media_items.excerpt: I've tried contacting Rep. Langworthy's office multiple times about the shutdown's impact on my family. No response.
